name: Fallen Throne: Excelsior
description: The year is 2065, a (human-created) virus wiped out the entire population of the world. Seeking for a new world beyond the black hole. The virus has started a big war and showed to many how fragile and unprepared human civilization is when it comes to even knowns like a pandemic with broken systems, the biggest fall of humanity has to lead to the point of mass destruction.  The exploration of CG anime style to document the Slices of pilot fighter life exploring the black hole as the last human, brought to life by a procedural Blender 3D in real-time Eevee render engine, the music score specifically created to capture the emotional feelings of being lonely on deep dark space.
